ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: How much do you value the goal of drinking moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you possess the necessary skills to drink moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent have you thought about potential obstacles that may interfere with your capacity to drink moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you track your progress towards the goal of drinking moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: How important is the goal of drinking moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you have what it takes to drink moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you schedule to ensure that you can drink moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you notice your successes with the goal of drinking moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: How essential/crucial is the goal of drinking moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you have the ability to drink moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you plan out in advance the steps necessary to drink moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you pay attention to your daily actions towards the goal of drinking moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent are you confident that you can drink moderately?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely

ElementDescription: To what extent do you set a limit on how much you will drink before you begin drinking?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= A little bit; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite a bit; 4= Extremely
